title: Strategy Trade
description: Strategy trade data containing future prices, delta values, and strategy symbols

shortFuturePrice.description: Short future value with up to 2 decimal places
shortFuturePrice.$comment: Represents the price of the short future leg in the strategy

longFuturePrice.description: Long future value with up to 2 decimal places
longFuturePrice.$comment: Represents the price of the long future leg in the strategy

delta.description: Delta value with up to 2 decimal places
delta.$comment: Represents the rate of change between the derivative price and the underlying asset price
